bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Thyristor Surge Protective Devices
IEEE Guide for the Application of Thyristor Surge Protective Devices

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Applications information on fixed voltage and gated thyristor surge protective devices(SPDs) are provided. Key device parameters and their sensitivities are explained. Several workedtelecommunication circuit design examples are given.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C62.37.1-2012 (Revision of IEEE Std C62.37.1-2000)
